text.p: Watertown is a city in the Greater Boston metropolitan area of Massachusetts.

list.item: Armenian Library and Museum of America, 65 Main St, ☏ +1 617 926-2562 . Th 6PM-9PM, F,Su 1PM-5PM, Sa 10AM-2PM. "Where Armenian culture comes alive." The most extensive collection of Armenian artifacts in North America. Changing exhibits and an extensive library. Adults $5, students $2, children under 12 free.
Arsenal Center for the Arts, 321 Arsenal St, ☏ +1 617 923-0100 . Theatre presentations and a gallery that is open Tu-F noon-5PM.
Studios of CatholicTV, 34 Chestnut St, ☏ +1 617 923-0220 . Tours by appointment only, M-F 10AM-4PM. National Catholic Television Network.
American Plumbing Museum, 86 Rosedale Rd, ✉ info@theplumbingmuseum.org .

text.head: Eat

list.item: The Halfway Cafe, 394 Main St, ☏ +1 617 926-3595 . M-F 11:30AM-1AM, Sa noon-1AMm Su noon-midnight. Good value choice for a sports bar. Check out the 8 for $8 specials. $.
Danish Pastry House, 205 Arlington St, Ste 4, ☏ +1 617 926-2747 . 7AM-5PM daily. Great selection of pastry. $.
Red Lentil, 600 Mt Auburn St, ☏ +1 617 972-9188 . M-Th 11AM-9:30PM, F 11AM-10PM, Sa 9AM-10PM, Su 9AM-9:30PM. Vegetarian and vegan cuisine. $.
Celebrity Pizza & Dairy Bar, 684 Mt Auburn St. M-F 11AM-10PM, Sa noon-10PM, Su 1PM-10PM. Great ice cream. Check out their delivery service! $.
New Ginza, 65 Galen St, ☏ +1 617 923-2100 . M-Th 11:30AM-10PM, F 11:30AM-11PM, Sa noon-11PM, Su noon-10PM. The best sushi in Watertown hands down. Friendly staff and great atmosphere to boot. $$.
Sevan Bakery, 599 Mt Auburn St, ☏ +1 617 924-9843 . M-Sa 8AM-8PM. Small authentic Armenian bakery. $.
Big Sky Bread Bakery & Cafe (Big Sky), 142 Main St, ☏ +1 617 332-4445 . M-F 6AM–6PM, Sa 7AM–5PM. Great local bakery. $$$.

SOFRA Bakery & Cafe, 1 Belmont St, Cambridge, ☏ +1 617 661-3161 . M-F 8AM-7PM, Sa-Su 8AM-6PM. Small vegan and vegetarian cafe. It is always crowded and has limited seating, but don't forget to check out the patio around the side! $.

Strip T's, 93 School St, ☏ +1 617 923-4330 . Lunch: M-F 11AM-4PM, Sa 11:30AM-PM; dinner: M-Sa 5PM-10PM. Amazing restaurant specializing in gourmet sandwiches and more. A casual relaxed atmosphere with a great staff! $$.

Stellina Restaurant, 47 Main St, ☏ +1 617 924-9475 . Lunch: Tu-F 11:30AM-2PM; dinner: M-Th 5PM-9:30PM, F-Sa 5PM-10PM, Su 5PM-9PM. A great upscale restaurant with local music. Check out their lunch menu and outdoor patio. $$.
Not Your Average Joe's, 55 Main St, ☏ +1 617 926-9229 . M-Th 11:30AM-10PM, F-Sa 11:30AM-11PM, Su noon-10PM. Classic American cuisine. A good place to bring kids. $$.
Deluxe Town Diner (The Town Diner), 627 Mt Auburn St, ☏ +1 617 926-8400 . Su-Th 7AM-9PM, F-Sa 7AM-10PM. A classic diner. It fills up fast so make sure to come early! $$.
